Articles.Content:
Hello all! Been playing KSP since late April, spent most of my time lurking while I got the ropes of the game. On one of my first visits, there was a post for younger players being introduced to the game with kind of a "what to do in KSP" list. I know that building an orbiter, space station, Mun landing, etc, are what to do, but I prefer to have a tangible list. Can anyone point me in the direction of that post, or something similar? Searches for such an animal have come up fruitless. Thank you in advance.

Greg

If you're looking for a bit of a more structured approach, I'd advise taking a look at the Campaigns segment of the wiki. The subpages give you missions with objectives to complete, but there's no hassle about keeping track of money or anything like that. Unfortunately, it's only about a third of the way complete compared to the final product.
There's also the Historical Missions tutorial section of the wiki; that's a pretty good playthrough. Start with Sputnik and go through the Salyut Programme (the ISS tutorial is incomplete).
